meanings.definition: To put in order or set right.
meanings.sent1: He straightened the books on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: She straightened out the misunderstanding with a simple explanation.
meanings.sent3: The magician straightened the tangled rope with a wave of his hand.

meanings.sent5: The mechanic straightened the bent metal back into shape.

meanings.definition: To make less confused or complicated.

meanings.sent2: He straightened the situation by clarifying the main points.
meanings.sent3: The comedian straightened the plot of the movie with a hilarious twist.
